name: Faction Studio
tagline: We Make Brilliant Mobile Apps for Brilliant Brands
description:
We create meaningful mobile user experiences that look great, define customer journeys and fulfill user’s needs in a manner which keeps people loyal to your product and brand.
Our iOS and Android developers work in small teams to move quickly to solve engineering problems and build secure, robust products. Together we’ve developed over 50 native iOS and Android apps since 2008.
The mobile apps we build are powered by the cloud-based backends we engineer for them. We employ single-page application architecture to serve as a hub for data processing, messaging, SMS, authentication and the like.
A growing part of our business is focused on emerging tech. We’ve built and launched products that utilize technologies such as Augmented and Virtual Reality, Internet of Things & Wearables and Blockchain.
